name: @every-time/timer-tracker
author: Every Time Team
description: Mac menu bar timer tracker with Google Calendar integration

scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.desktop.json -w" "vite build --watch" "wait-on dist/desktop/main.js && cp desktop/preload.js dist/desktop/ && cp desktop/credentials.json dist/desktop/ && wait-on dist/renderer/index.html && electron . --dev"
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.desktop.json && cp desktop/preload.js dist/desktop/ && cp desktop/credentials.json dist/desktop/ && vite build
scripts.build:desktop: tsc -p tsconfig.desktop.json && cp desktop/preload.js dist/desktop/ && cp desktop/credentials.json dist/desktop/
scripts.rebuild:electron: pkill -f 'Timer Tracker' || true && pkill -f 'electron' || true && pnpm build:electron && open dist-electron/ && open /Applications/
